readable.title: 2798880731_4f51634374
readable.content: A dad celebrates a birthday with his family via web cam . A woman and two children talk on a web cam to a man . Looks like a birthday party . A woman and two little girls celebrate a birthday with a man over a web cam . A woman sits with two children while a picture of a man is on the computer on the table . A woman with two children , a cake , and a laptop .
